features: 3 IN 1 CLEANING EFFICIENCY: The MR.SIGA Pet Hair Removal Rubber Broom combines a pet hair removing rubber brush, squeegee for liquid spills, and a microfiber cloth attachment, making it a versatile tool for tackling pet hair, liquid spills, and dust all in one go.

EFFICIENT PET HAIR REMOVAL: The MR.SIGA Pet hair broom features a specially designed rubber brush head that effectively captures and removes pet hair from carpets and hard floors, ensuring a cleaner home environment for pet owners.

MULTIPURPOSE SQUEEGEE FUNCTION: Integrated squeegee edge easily manages liquid spills on various surfaces, making it perfect for cleaning kitchens, bathrooms, and entryways without switching tools. The carpet brush for pet hair are designed for pet hair and dust cleaning without damaging the fibers of the carpets

ADJUSTABLE EXTRA LONG 61inch HANDLE: The sweeping brush indoor comes with 4-section sturdy steel handle with a powder-coated finish, you can adjust the pole length and fix it to any available position, which offers a comfortable pickup and hold for different person, makes your cleaning job without having to bend down.

EXTRA MICROFIBER CLOTH: The indoor broom includes an extra microfiber cloth, ideal for dusting floors before sweeping or as a finishing touch after brushing. The cloth's fine fibers trap dust particles efficiently, leaving surfaces spotless and polished.
description: Product Description MR.SIGA Instructions of Collecting Pet Hair on Carpet Use a single-direction sweeping motion with moderate pressure to allow the rubber bristles to dig into the carpet fibers and collect pet hair. Repeat this process across the carpet, occasionally altering your sweeping direction to better collect hair embedded in diﬀerent carpet ﬁbers. MULTI-PURPOSE CLEANING IDEAL FOR CARPET, RUG, TILE, HARDWOOD, MARBLE, WINDOW. Flexible rubber bristles easily collect hair from carpets and floors, and the built-in squeegee is safe to use on hardwood floors or windows, easily removing dirt water stains without the risk of scratching. An included microfibre rag can be used for floor dusting. Tips: 1.Rubber brush head can extend its life by drying and keeping it in a cool place after cleaning. 2. 4-section pole is recommended to wipe dry after use before storing.
